title: Who has told the most verified lies in history? - Quora

response.answer_text: Without a doubt that would be The Donald. He’s a prodigious public liar, advancing toward 20,000 verified lies before he finishes his four-year tour. Modern technology is partly to blame. There probably were liars in the past who would have given him a run for his money if they had had the opportunity to compete with him mano a mano while enjoying the same technological boosts he befits from.

Every con-man lies. That is what they do. You might enjoy a movie, “Catch Me If You Can”: Catch Me If You Can - Wikipedia Catch Me If You Can (2002) - IMDb I suppose Trump has told more lies than any U.S. president in history, but W was a liar, too.
